channel.title: How we boosted app downloads by A/B testing icons
channel.description: Want to share with you our experience in conducting A/B testing of a customer’s Google Play icon.Try to guess which icon resulted in the largest number of application downloads during A/B testing. http://blog.icondesignlab.com/en/2017/how-can-an-application-s-icon-design-affect-the-number-of-app-downloads/ Do you conduct A/B testing?

item.title: How we boosted app downloads by A/B testing icons
item.dc:creator: Diana_Vyshnova
item.description:
Want to share with you our experience in conducting A/B testing of a customer’s Google Play icon.Try to guess which icon resulted in the largest number of application downloads during A/B testing.

IconDesignLAB.com Blog – 26 Apr 17

How can an application's icon design affect the number of app downloads?

How can you understand which icon design will attract the most downloads? Even a professional designer with years of experience can't answer this question with certainty. However, there's a way to solve the problem: by ordering an icon design that's...


Do you conduct A/B testing?

Read full topic
